'''1.5.1 Build 1<ref name="blog">{{link |url=https://minecraftedu.tumblr.com/post/48745879155/minecraftedu-151-is-now-available|title=MinecraftEdu 1.5.1 is now available! |date=24 April 2013|website=Tumblr|author=}}</ref>''' is the first build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.5.1, released on April 4, 2013. This is the first and oldest build of ''MinecraftEdu'' and was also the first official release of the game. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.5.1]].

== Additions ==

* Based on [[Java Edition 1.5.1]].
* Support for most Forge mods
* Improved in-game world controls
* Improved teacher’s ‘Give Menu’ to allow any item to be given, including those from mods
* More informative server displays
* Improved Mac support
* Updated WorldEdit functionality
* Ability to automatically upgrade or downgrade (we also changed our version number system to make things more clear)
* Lots of polish including tool-tips, new icons, and more!
* Support for Online World Templates (still experimental)
